title: Last activity you solved few questions. In this activity we give you some questions on Flowchart, try to answer those questions

questions.questionText: A flowchart is a type of diagram that represents an algorithm, workflow or process, showing the steps as boxes of various kinds, and their order by connecting them with arrows.

questionText.text: What is the purpose of this symbol?

options.option: Indicates an action or step in the flowchart process.
Indicates the beginning or end of the flowchart (i.e. Start, Quit, or End).
A subroutine by user request, where the user is able to request info, a particular subroutine etc. from the program
Indicates that the program has a save function.

questions.questionText: What is a diagrammatic representation that illustrates the sequence of operations to be performed to get the solution of a problem?

questionText.text: What is the purpose of this symbol?
What is the purpose of this symbol?

options.option: Represents when something is input into the program or output from the program
Asks a question and then determines which route the program will take
An action done by the program (e.g. calculate the area of a square)
Shows the direction and sequence of processes
